attributes.description:
The supply chain is the process that a product goes through to get to the consumer at the end. Throughout the process of researching the supply chain of gummy bears, I was surprised to learn how many ingredients from all over the world are shipped to the factory, then to the distribution center, then to Denver CO. It made me realize how much fuel is used just to get one item to me, and all of the things that companies could do to be better to the environment. One idea I have is to make the distribution center and the factory in the same place so that the product doesn't have to be shipped halfway around the world from the factory to the distribution center.  
Created by Mackenzie
attributes.title: How Gummy Bears Get to Me!

attributes.description: Sugar cane is grown in many places around the world, but Brazil is the main producer of sugar cane.
attributes.title: sugar cane

attributes.description: Gelatin is made of many disgusting ingredients from cows and pigs. For example, cow skin, pig skin, and intestines.
attributes.title: Gelatin

attributes.description: This plastic factory is just one possible distributer of plastic for the packaging of gummy bears.
attributes.title: Plastic Distributer

attributes.description: The distribution center is in Maryland.
attributes.title: Distribution Center

attributes.description: High fructose corn syrup is a main ingredient in gummy bears.
attributes.title: Corn Syrup

attributes.description: Coconuts are mainly grown in the Philippines.
attributes.title: Coconut Oil

attributes.description: All of the ingredients are shipped to the factory, where they are made into gummy bears!! Gummy bears first came from Germany, and now the main Haribo factory is in Germany.
attributes.title: Haribo Factory

attributes.description: It takes a lot of fuel to get coconut oil to the Haribo factory.
attributes.title: Coconut Oil to Haribo Factory

attributes.description: After the gummy bears are shipped from the factory to the distribution center, the tiny gelatin bears take a long plane ride from Maryland to Colorado.
attributes.title: Distribution Center to Me!
Haribo Factory to Distribution Center
attributes.description: The gummy bears are shipped to the distribution center in Maryland, after they have been made.
